subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Andy Pettitte allowed two runs and struck out 10 in six innings, and Mark Teixeira bashed a tie-breaking leadoff home run in the ninth inning to help lift the Yankees.
snippet: Andy Pettitte allowed two runs and struck out 10 in six innings, and Mark Teixeira bashed a tie-breaking leadoff home run in the ninth inning to help lift the Yankees.
